summary: Elite attorney Kang Seong-Hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.
cast: Jung-woo Ha|Hee-soon Park|Jang Hyuk|Dong-il Sung|Won-joong Jung|Sung-ryung Kim|Hyuk-kwon Park|Da-in Yoo|Hee-jin Choi|Byeong-guk Hwang|Ju Jin-Mo|Jin-mo Joo|Danwoo Jung|Chang-Hoon Lee|Hwa-ryong Lee
title: Eui-roi-in
